author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
In Tolkien's first draft of the Fall of Gondolin, we find a fascinating concept - that Morgoth's dragons were actually machines of metal.  Today, we dive into this topic, exploring the features of these massive creatures and their nature.

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!

title: Morgoth's Metal Dragons | Tolkien Explained
